publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-6855Stewart Maxwell:The Recruit Just the Job for Renfrewshire School Pupilsâ€”That the Parliament commends Renfrewshire Council for the success of its initiative, The Recruit, an Apprentice-style business challenge that aims to provide school pupils in Renfrewshire with a range of skills and practical experience to help them get started in the business world; notes that the fifth and sixth-year pupils spent the summer working in teams and taking part in a series of business challenges designed to test their skills in areas such as leadership, problem solving and communication; further notes that the project was modelled on the success of a similar initiative started in Inverclyde that for the last three years has helped young people get into employment or further education; offers congratulations to Sarah Jane Sarkosh and Lynsey MacKay, the competition winners recently announced at Paisley Town Hall, and wishes all the young entrepreneurs involved continued success in the future.
S3M-6855 The Recruit Just the Job for Renfrewshire School Pupils (lodged on 20 August 2010) Stuart McMillan*, Ms Wendy Alexander*, Bill Kidd*, Aileen Campbell*, Kenneth Gibson*, Jamie Hepburn*
